cot: The query uses the superhero table (T1), hero_attribute table (T2), and attribute table (T3) as required. Each table is correctly referenced in the query.

The query selects the superhero_name from the superhero table, uses the attribute_name from the attribute table, and the attribute_value from the hero_attribute table. All required columns are present.
The query includes a filter condition on the attribute_name column to only include attributes named 'Durability'. This meets the requirement fully.
The query includes a filter condition on the attribute_value column to only include values less than 50. This meets the requirement fully.
